page.statement:
To complete this module you need to pass the following assessment; the passmark is 100%.

We recommend you read the questions carefully before answering. Once you have moved on you cannot return to previous questions.

question.text: Which of the following is the most essential part of effective hand-washing?
question.ans: Always remove protective clothing before hand-washing
The hands must be dried on protective clothing or a tea towel
A bar of soap should be used to create lather
Wash the hands thoroughly using warm running water

question.text: Which of the following statements is correct?
question.ans: The law does not require food handlers to have high standards of personal hygiene
Bad hygiene habits never result in physical contamination of food
Food handlers carry food poisoning organisms at one time or another
You are less likely to carry food poisoning organisms when you are ill

question.text: Which of the following is the most important time for a food handler to wash his/her hands?
question.ans: After removing protective clothing
After going to the toilet
When leaving a food room
Before cleaning the floor

question.text: Which of the following statements is true?
question.ans: Blue-coloured plasters are worn because they do not show the dirt
There is no risk to food if a food handler has a boil
Protective clothing should be worn to travel to work
Persons with skin infections should report to their supervisor before working as a food handler

question.text: What is the main reason for food handlers washing their hands before starting work?
question.ans: To remove any physical contaminants
To reduce the risk of contaminating food with food poisoning bacteria
To protect the hands from skin infections
To remove any unusual smells

question.text: What is recommended to be kept in a first aid box in a food room?
question.ans: A supply of headache tablets
Antiseptic cream
Blue-coloured waterproof dressings
Skin-coloured waterproof dressings

question.text: What is the main reason why food handlers remove jewellery before handling food?
question.ans: They won't be insured if it's lost
It could be contaminated with grease and food
It could result in microbiological or physical contamination of food
It may be damaged

question.text: What is the main reason why waterproof dressings are recommended to be blue?
question.ans: Because blue is a fashionable colour
So that they don't become stained
Because they are stronger
So that they are easier to see if they fall into food

question.text: Which of the following lists all the law requires to be provided at washbasins?
question.ans: Cold water, soap and drying facilities
Hot and cold water, a nailbrush and drying facilities
Hot and cold water, soap and drying facilities
Soap, hot air dryers and hot water
